short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Promote mindful shopping and reduce impulse buying with our Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Super Good Plan shopping assistant Chrome extension is designed to promote mindful shopping and reduce impulse purchases online.

Key Features:
Overlay on Product Pages: Displays a non-intrusive overlay on e-commerce product pages, providing insightful tips to encourage thoughtful purchasing decisions.

Shopping Detection: Automatically detects when a user is on a supported store, offering a seamless browsing experience.

Supported stores: Amazon, ASOS.

Dynamic Tips: Randomly presents one of several pre-set tips about financial wellness and the drawbacks of impulse buying each time a product page is loaded.

Expandable Icon: Initially appears as a small, discreet badge on the page, which expands into a full overlay when clicked, similar to popular extensions like Grammarly.

This extension aims to enhance users' online shopping experience by fostering financial mindfulness and reducing the likelihood of regrettable impulse purchases.
